ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 08/05/2021 05:15 AM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Acute respiratory failure. COMPARISON: XR CHEST AP PORTABLE 08/04/2021 5:49 AM. TECHNIQUE: 1 view. FINDINGS: Lines and tubes: Tip of endotracheal tube terminates approximately 2 cm above the carina. Subdiaphragmatic gastric suction tube. Right IJ central venous catheter tip terminates in the region of the right atrium. Lungs/Pleura: There is a left basilar opacity, which has increased from prior. Mild right basilar opacities. No significant pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Mediastinum: Stable cardiomediastinal contours. Other: None. IMPRESSION: 1. Lines and tubes as above. 2. Left basilar opacity, which has increased from prior. 3. Mild right basilar opacities, likely atelectasis.
